tweet: I've just spent nearly an hour typing up womens equality revision notes from scratch when there were revision templates all along.
I went downstairs to go and get my pencilcase, came back up with a slice of cake and no pencilcase. Down i go again

AND NOTHING IS GOING TO CHANGE THAT. ok good. Now it cannot be changed by my forever deliberating mind.
